Package edu.ou.cs2334.project5.presenters

Class NonogramPresenter

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project5.presenters.NonogramPresenter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Openable
public class NonogramPresenter extends Object implements Openable
The graphical view and model data are connected by this class. Because the size of a NonogramModel is immutable, any size adjustments (rows or columns) require re-initializing the model and view information. The model reference is completely updated. The view reference stays the same, though underlying data within the view undergoes change.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Wiseman
